profileAlternative.name: Kunal Pavashiya
profileAlternative.headline: Frontend Software Engineer Intern at Palo Alto Networks || MS Software Engineering at San Jose State
profileAlternative.summary:
Hello! I'm a Software Engineer! Absolutely in love with what I do and quite good at what I do.
Quite a quick learner with 3+ years of experience writing code in various technologies .
I'm currently a Graduate student at San Jose State University, studying M.S. in software Engineering.
I’m a very quick-learner, able to quickly adapt to the any situation or trend, meanwhile maintaining a high level of efficiency and growth.

My Skillset/Armory :
Languages: C, C++, Java, JavaScript (JS), Python, C#.
Web Technologies: Node.js, Express.js, AngularJS, React JS, Redux, Ajax, CSS, HTML / HTML5, Bootstrap, XML, JSON, ES6.
Tools: JIRA, Backbase, Git, Eclipse, Docker, Kubernetes.
Automated Testing: Mocha, Jasmine.
Operating Systems: Windows, Unix, Linux, MacOs.
Database: Relational Databases (RDBMS) such as MySQL, SQL, Oracle, NoSQL Databases such as MongoDB, GraphQL.
Soft Skills: Strong communications and social skills, Strong analytical and critical thinking skills, Excellent organization, time management, and interpersonal skills.

positions.title: Software Developer
positions.description:
• Developed highly scalable website and mobile application for India’s largest private bank with estimated monthly visitors in the range of 60 Million. Handled and lead daily operations of a team of 10+ innovative people delivering high-quality applications.
• Hands on experience in building functional, customer-facing and User-friendly UI ...

items: API creation for an e-commerce firm
Web development for a leading Indian bank
